title: Hello World Intrusion
description: A basic challenge to get started with cybersecurity. Can you find the hidden flag?
hints: Look for comments in the HTML
Try viewing the page in different ways
content:
# Hello World Intrusion

Welcome to your first cybersecurity challenge!

## Scenario
You've been given access to a simple webpage. Your task is to find the hidden flag.

## Instructions
1. Examine the webpage carefully
2. Look for anything unusual or hidden
3. Submit the flag when you find it

Flag format: BSY{text_here}

Good luck!
